vsParam:
Wow, [px]!
You made new items. Heehee. You're in such a good state!

Senpai, you work harder and harder lately.
How to put it... You do look like a first-class alchemist now!

Ha ha ha. Of course. [px] is known in the Academy as a
young alchemist who has mastered the four elements of alchemy.

Although not being able to make the real "Pyroxene of Wisdom"
at the moment... [px] won't give up.

Yeah...!
[px], what do you plan to do next?

To realize the dream of "becoming an
alchemist recognized by everyone"...

Hehe.
I was just about to talk about it.

Ah. Bergamot Sensei.
... What do you mean by that?

[px].
I'm here to tell you something interesting.

Yes. You've mastered the four elements of alchemy: earth,
water, fire and wind. But... there are more advanced skills.
The alchemical skills of light and darkness.

The alchemical skills of light and darkness...! I've heard of it.
They're skills more advanced than the four elements...!

Huh? Are they really that amazing!?
More advanced than the four elements...!?

That's right, [px]. How about making it your next target
to master the alchemical skills of light and darkness?

In this case... Hehe.
I think you'll be one step closer to your dream, won't you?

I knew you'd say that.
In this case, [px], go to the outside world again and soar.

I have complete confidence in you. And I'm sure
you'll become the alchemist appreciated by everyone...!

... Hmm— Sensei. Senpai is going to the outside world,
but I have one question.

The alchemical skills of light and darkness you just mentioned...
Where can one learn them?

Huh. No idea?
You're the teacher, yet you don't know!?

Certainly. The alchemical skills of light and darkness have
been missing for decades. I've learned neither of them.

Like other types of alchemy, there must be skill books
of them hidden somewhere in this world...

I see... First, we need to find the place
where the skill books are stored, right?...

It's better if we can find someone who knows
about it and ask for some information.

... OK. Let's go ask Ru Sensei.
He might know something.

Yeah. Is Ru Sensei doing a field investigation right now?
Let's go to the field to meet him. It'll be faster.

OK!
Let's go ask Ru Sensei, everyone!

Hey, Senpai ♪
Can I go with you this time...

Nope. You're a first-year, right?
No first-year is allowed to study abroad.

Boo-hoo— You're going to leave me behind again. I...
(sigh)... [px] Senpai, good luck.

Ha ha ha... Sorry about that, Wistyria...
We'll hit the road now!

OK. Don't worry!
Everyone, please take care!
